channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 09:43 Air alarm to Kirovohrad Oblast follow further reports.
item.description: 游댮 09:43 Air alarm to Kirovohrad Oblast follow further reports.#Kirovograd This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 09:40 Dumping anxiety in the Zolotonsky district.Creb
item.description: 游릭 09:40 Dumping anxiety in the Zolotonsky district.Creb This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 09:40 Drive alarm to Poltava region. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 09:40 Drive alarm to Poltava region. Watch for further messages.#Poltava_Blast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 09:32 The threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!

item.title: 游리 08:52 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Mirovskaya Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community

Consider that the alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region#m_ Marganets_ta_Ametska_Marganetska_The. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
